jot.ai.steeringBehaviours

Class AbstractSteeringBehavior

  • java.lang.Object
    • jot.ai.steeringBehaviours.AbstractSteeringBehavior
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Alignment, Flee, Hide, Seek, Separation

    public abstract class AbstractSteeringBehavior
extends Object
    Abstract class that each steering behavior class should implement.
    Author:
    G. Amador & A. Gomes

      • getDirection2Target

        public float getDirection2Target(org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D targetPosition)
        Get the direction (i.e., rotation) where given target is relatively to AI controlled agent.
        Parameters:
        targetPosition - position in Cartesian coordinates of given target.
        Returns:
        rotation in order for A.I. controlled agent to look at the given target.

      • getDirection2Target

        public float getDirection2Target(org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D targetPosition,
                                 org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D agentPosition)
        Get the direction (i.e., rotation) where given target is relatively to given agent.
        Parameters:
        targetPosition - position in Cartesian coordinates of given target.
        agentPosition - position in Cartesian coordinates of given agent.
        Returns:
        rotation in order for agent in position pPos to look at given target with position tPos.
